title: ‘CAPTION THIS’ Contest 2 > Score a Ticket to MamaBear from Rackspace
content: WINNERS ANNOUNCED: CONGRATS GRACE & MAYA! Our buddies over at Rackspace are giving away a free ticket to MamaBear  to the joker who provides the best caption to the pic below (btw - this is original artwork by Cartoonist, Hugh MacLeod): HOW IT WORKS: 1. Post your caption in the comment section below > You have to scroll WAY down. 2. When the contest has ended, the folks at Rackspace will select a winner. 3. We'll post the winner to our blog and notify via email 4.  The free ticket can be used for future events so play along if you can't attend MamaBear!
